method.text: Heat the oil in a large stockpot. Add onion and garlic and fry for 2 min or until softened. Add aubergine and tomatoes and cook gently for 10 min.
Meanwhile place pasta in a pan of  boiling water. Return to the boil then simmer for 8-10 min or until tender. Drain well.
Stir the drained pasta into the pot with the kidney beans, beans, courgettes, stock and seasoning. Bring to the boil then simmer for 15 min until the vegetables are tender.
Preheat a medium grill. Sprinkle over the Parmesan cheese. Place under grill for 1-2 min until golden. Serve immediately.
